BadgeDetail.Name: Fuel & Exhaust I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of the fuel system. They can inspect fuel lines, exhaust mounts and the tank; and replace fuel filters, exhaust sections and air filters.

Task.Title: Inspection
Task.Body: Upload evidence inspecting fuel lines, exhaust mounts and the fuel tank.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence inspecting fuel lines, exhaust mounts and the fuel tank.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence inspecting fuel lines, exhaust mounts and the fuel tank.

Task.Title: Replace
Task.Body: Upload evidence replacing a fuel filter, exhaust section and an air filter.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence replacing a fuel filter, exhaust section and an air filter.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence replacing a fuel filter, exhaust section and an air filter.
